Secure gastric tube.sentence: The nurse positions the patient in a semi-upright position to facilitate gastric tube insertion.
Secure gastric tube.subject: The nurse

Secure gastric tube.sentence: The nurse measures the appropriate length of the gastric tube from the patient's nose to the stomach.
Secure gastric tube.subject: The nurse
Secure gastric tube.object: the appropriate length of the gastric tube

Secure gastric tube.sentence: The nurse applies lubricant to the tip of the gastric tube to ease the insertion process.
Secure gastric tube.subject: The nurse
Secure gastric tube.object: lubricant to the tip of the gastric tube

Secure gastric tube.sentence: The nurse gently inserts the gastric tube into the patient's nostril and advances it toward the stomach.
Secure gastric tube.subject: The nurse
Secure gastric tube.object: the gastric tube into the patient's nostril

Secure gastric tube.sentence: The nurse confirms proper placement of the gastric tube by checking for gastric contents or auscultating the abdomen.
Secure gastric tube.subject: The nurse
Secure gastric tube.object: proper placement of the gastric tube
